panels.title: NIC 연결 상태 변경 총 횟수

targets.expr: (node_network_carrier{instance="$host:3003" ,job="cube", device=~"e.+", device!~"e.+\\..+"} == 1)  * on (device, instance) node_network_mtu_bytes{instance="$host:3003" ,job="cube", device=~"e.+", device!~"e.+\\..+"}

(sum by (exebase, instance) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_cpu_seconds_total{exebase="node_exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m]))) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase, instance) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_cpu_seconds_total{exebase="libvirt-exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m]))) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase, instance) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_cpu_seconds_total{exebase="process-exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m])))

(sum by (exebase) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_read_bytes_total{exebase="node_exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m]))) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_read_bytes_total{exebase="libvirt-exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m]))) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_read_bytes_total{exebase="process-exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m])))

(sum by (exebase) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_write_bytes_total{exebase="node_exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m]))) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_write_bytes_total{exebase="libvirt-exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m]))) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (rate(namedprocess_namegroup_write_bytes_total{exebase="process-exporter", instance="$host:3004"}[1m])))

(sum by (exebase) (namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{exebase="node_exporter", memtype="virtual", instance="$host:3004"})) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{exebase="libvirt-exporter", memtype="virtual", instance="$host:3004"})) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{exebase="process-exporter", memtype="virtual", instance="$host:3004"}))

(sum by (exebase) (namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{exebase="node_exporter", memtype="resident", instance="$host:3004"})) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{exebase="libvirt-exporter", memtype="resident", instance="$host:3004"})) + on (instance) (sum by (exebase) (namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{exebase="process-exporter", memtype="resident", instance="$host:3004"}))
